channel.title: Need help with whonix download please
channel.description:
I need help with installation. whenever i try to install whonix, this message pops up
Failed to import appliance C:\Users\Jonathan\Downloads\Whonix-Gateway-8.2.ova.
Could not create the clone medium 'C:\Users\Jonathan\VirtualBox VMs\Whonix-Gateway\Whonix-Gateway-8.2-disk1.vmdk'.
VMDK: Compressed image is corrupted 'C:\Users\Jonathan\Whonix-Gateway-8.2-disk1.vmdk' (VERR_ZIP_CORRUPTED).
Result Code: VBOX_E_FILE_ERROR (0x80BB0004) Component: Appliance Interface: IAppliance {3059cf9e-25c7-4f0b-9fa5-3c42e441670b}
Happens every time i download on the website. I'm on my 7th download's and it still wont work.
windows 7 home premium virtaulbox 4.3.12 r93733.

item.title: Need help with whonix download please
item.dc:creator: Greenwhonix
item.description:
legobuilderjonathan:

I’m on my 7th download’s and it still wont work.

Instead of struggling like this, I suggest providing more technical details about the way you’re downloading the images.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with whonix download please

item.title: Need help with whonix download please
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Did you verify the ova?

Whonix – 31 Dec 19

FREE Whonix ™ Download for Windows, macOS, Linux and Others

FREE Download Whonix ™. Privacy Protection. Anonymity Online. For Windows, macOS, Linux.

Maybe some antivirus application is corrupting the download?

item.title: Need help with whonix download please

item.description:
I need help with installation.
whenever i try to install whonix, this message pops up

Failed to import appliance C:\Users\Jonathan\Downloads\Whonix-Gateway-8.2.ova.

Component: Appliance
Interface: IAppliance {3059cf9e-25c7-4f0b-9fa5-3c42e441670b}
